thread.title: The admirer and the fool ...
thread.title_full: The admirer and the fool ... | News24

author: news24.com
title: The admirer and the fool ...
text:
Yesterday evening there was a pocket of clouds in the western direction of where I live ...
I called my mom to come and have a look, It was an astonishing sight ....
How we imagined pictures and shapes in those clouds ... How slowly they moved and how tremendously they shaped so many things ...
At first it was what seemed like a large eagle with its head turned and looking back .... It was prominent , Its head and feathery body.. There was even a stagger of what resembled its wings ...
Then shortly, it was what seemed like an eagles claw, Its talons particularly shown.
This lasted sometime, with what seemed like a rib-cage with what seemed like two images inside ...
I even saw what seemed a cupid like fellow riding an arrow , he he ,
It can be a trip watching clouds and not all experiences can ever be the same ...
Clouds ? What is with all the glamour ?
Ive seen smoke and I have seen many clouds but there are times , especially sunset when the clouds are nothing less than glamorous ...
With the silver linings so clearly shown , ahh wow , the painter of painters .. How many did I not even bother to look at ? Must be thousands ...
How is possible to have moving clouds that are so particular and yet unique ?
What a fool I was not to take pictures ...
